title: 106_s1857
content: Directs the Secretary: (1) no later than July 15, 2000, to verify the selection of current Bureau of Land Management lands in New Mexico made by the Navajo Indian Nation pursuant to a resettlement plan for the Navajo Tribe. And (2) within 30 days thereafter, to issue patents to the Navajo Nation to the relinquished coal preference rights.
